solution_line_template: The books will cost ${total_cost_books} because {num_books} x {cost_per_book} = <<{num_books}*{cost_per_book}={total_cost_books}>>{total_cost_books}
He needs to save up ${money_needed_to_save} because {total_cost_books} - {money_already_has} = <<{total_cost_books}-{money_already_has}={money_needed_to_save}>>{money_needed_to_save}
